name: Infestari (Capstone Project)
description:
Humankind has unknowingly brought back an alien infestation that has overtaken and mutated earth's insects, forcing the remains of humanity to escape into space. Few years later, ex-military commander Juno is sent back to earth to assess the situation and hopefully secure a foothold for Humanity’s return.

Landing zone: Infested Power Plant, Oregon, U.S.A.

INFESTARI is an 3D isometric tactical stealth shooter set in a dark dystopian future where earth no longer belongs to humankind. The game will feature a vacant and isolated atmosphere, intense stealth and combat, and a chilling environment overtaken by the ravenous infestation. The game is being developed by a small team of students at the Toronto Film School, and the vertical slice project is set to be released by December 2021.
